mapper.insert: insert into chat( chat_no, chat_room_no, member_email, chat_mention_target, chat_content ) values( chat_seq.nextval, #{chatRoomNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{chatMentionTarget}, #{chatContent} )
mapper.select: select c.*, m.member_nick, mi.attach_no from chat c join moim mo on c.chat_room_no = mo.chat_room_no join moim_member mm on mo.moim_no = mm.moim_no join member m on c.member_email = m.member_email left outer join member_image mi on m.member_email = mi.member_email where mm.member_email = #{memberEmail} and c.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} and c.chat_time >= mm.moim_member_join order by c.chat_time asc
mapper.delete: delete chat_entry where chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} and member_email = #{memberEmail}
mapper.select: select chat_room_no from chat_entry where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select * from chat_entry where chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} and member_email = #{memberEmail}
